author: Jeff Page (@jtp10181)
releaseNotes:
Support for ANY standard Z-Wave Power Metering Plug

Multi-Channel Power Plugs [0.1.0] - 2023-10-21
  - Initial public release to HPM
  - Enabled, tested, and adjusted addChild code
  - Fixed bug with lower limits not being enforced

Standard Plugs [1.2.1] - 2023-05-24
  - Fix for possible RuntimeException error due to bad cron string
